Installation¶

Since CudaPyInt is a pure Python module, it should be pretty easy to install. Make sure you have numpy, PyCUDA and the CUDA SDK installed on your system before you start.

From source¶

Once you’ve downloaded and unpacked the source, you can navigate into the root source directory and run:

$ python setup.py build
$ python setup.py install --user

You might need to run this using sudo depending on your Python installation.
